radiographic_examinations.findings: Scarring or atelectasis in the right middle lobe; no pleural or pericardial effusion; normal liver and other abdominal organs; kidneys enhance symmetrically; no bowel obstruction; prominent mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes increased in number; multiple new intra-pelvic fluid collections, largest in the rectouterine pouch measuring 8.0 x 7.5 x 4.7 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Multiple new intra-pelvic fluid collections noted; prominent inguinal lymph nodes slightly increased in size compared to the prior study.
